heroSubtitle: Not just code — we engineer growth, efficiency, and long‑term competitive advantage.
whyDesc: Business‑first mindset. End‑to‑end delivery. Transparent pricing. Bilingual support (FR/EN/AR).
approachParagraph: We don’t just deliver features — we deliver measurable outcomes: faster time‑to‑market, reduced operational costs, and scalable foundations.

cases.title: IntelliPower
cases.detail: Developed smart backend services for performance monitoring, reliability, and cost reduction in energy systems.

cases.title: BSC Boumerdes
cases.detail: A platform for the Wilaya of Boumerdes to manage haubergs and hotels, while offering visitors an app to discover the best attractions and places in the region.

cases.title: Shop.co
cases.detail: Online clothing store providing a seamless shopping experience with optimized checkout, catalog management, and scalable infrastructure.

cases.title: TATWEER
cases.detail: Built a modern logistics and freighting platform to digitize operations, improve efficiency, and enable transparent transport management.

cases.title: GrowPath

cases.detail: End-to-end solution (mobile, backend, dashboard) with AI video validation, donation tracking, and NGO transparency.

cases.detail: Custom e-learning platform supporting courses, student engagement, and scalable content delivery.

cases.title: EventHub
cases.detail: Lightweight event management platform with NestJS + PostgreSQL, email notifications, RSVPs, and real-time updates.

whyTiles.v: Outcomes over output: ROI, savings, growth.
